project_plan.name: Directory Monitoring Script in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python script that monitors a specified directory for new files and logs their names and creation times.

task.name: Specify the directory to be monitored
Implement functionality to monitor the directory for new files
Log the name and creation time of any new files detected
Write tests to ensure the monitoring and logging functionality works as expected
Execute tests on the monitoring script to confirm it behaves as intended
